entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Charlottetown
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:39 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Drizzle, -0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Charlottetown Airport 5:28 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Drizzle
Temperature: -0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -1.1°C
Wind: N 28 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of freezing drizzle or rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy mixed with freezing rain changing to freezing drizzle or ice pellets this evening. Fog patches dissipating early this evening. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Ice pellets or freezing rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Ice pellets changing to periods of freezing rain near noon. Risk of freezing rain late in the morning. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 5 mm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023
